instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: All frontend files are .jsx (React JS), NOT .tsx. Do not use TypeScript syntax.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Syne' font for all headings to give a unique fintech identity. Import it in index.css via @import or link tag.
CRITICAL: Ensure all monetary values are formatted with the Naira symbol (₦). Example: '₦50,000.00'.
CRITICAL: For the 'Investment Packages', use a Card layout that highlights the 'Daily Profit' and 'Total Return' clearly.
CRITICAL: The 'Proof of Payment' upload must use a drag-and-drop zone style (dashed border) to feel modern.
CRITICAL: Admin Dashboard must be dense. Use tables from Shadcn, but style the headers with 'bg-slate-900' and 'text-slate-400'.
CRITICAL: Do not use default scrollbars. Hide them or style them thin and dark.
CRITICAL: Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Preferred icons: 'Wallet', 'TrendingUp', 'ShieldCheck', 'Banknote', 'History', 'Users'.
CRITICAL: Always add 'data-testid' to interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
